statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, location, habitat_type FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_size > 100;
SELECT habitat_name AS name, location AS loc, habitat_type AS type FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE location LIKE '%national park%';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_size FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_size BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY habitat_size DESC
SELECT habitat_id, location, habitat_name FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_size > 1000 AND habitat_type IS NOT NULL
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type, location FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_name LIKE 'S%' OR habitat_type = 'Wetland'
SELECT * FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY habitat_id
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_size FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE location = 'Africa'
SELECT * FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_description FROM habitats;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM wildlife_species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM wildlife_species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM habitats WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_description FROM habitats ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM wildlife_species WHERE habitat_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY species_id ASC;
SELECT habitat_id, COUNT(species_id) AS species_count FROM wildlife_species GROUP BY habitat_id HAVING species_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats WHERE region = 'Forest';
SELECT animal_name, species, habitat_name FROM animals JOIN habitats ON animals.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id;
SELECT site_name, location FROM tourism_sites WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM animals WHERE species = 'Tiger';
SELECT * FROM habitats WHERE region = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats ORDER BY habitat_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM animals WHERE species = 'Tiger' AND habitat_id = 2;
SELECT site_name, location FROM tourism_sites WHERE habitat_id IN (SELECT habitat_id FROM habitats WHERE region = 'Savannah') ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT habitat_name, COUNT(animal_id) FROM habitats LEFT JOIN animals ON habitats.habitat_id = animals.habitat_id GROUP BY habitat_name HAVING COUNT(animal_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, location FROM Habitats ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM Species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT tourist_name, nationality FROM Tourists WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Observations ORDER BY observation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT tourist_name, age, nationality FROM Tourists WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM Species WHERE population_size > 1000 AND conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT observation_id, observation_date, observation_location FROM Observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;

SELECT T.tourist_name, S.species_name, O.observation_date FROM Tourists T INNER JOIN Observations O ON T.tourist_id = O.observer_id INNER JOIN Species S ON S.species_id = O.species_id ORDER BY O.observation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM habitat ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM habitat WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT observation_date, observation_time, observer_name, observation_description FROM observation ORDER BY observation_date DESC, observation_time;

SELECT tourist.name, tourist.age, tourist.gender, visit.visit_date, habitat.name AS visited_habitat FROM tourist JOIN visit ON tourist.id = visit.tourist_id JOIN habitat ON visit.habitat_id = habitat.id;
SELECT animal.name, animal.species, habitat.name AS habitat_name FROM animal JOIN habitat ON animal.habitat_id = habitat.id WHERE habitat.location = 'Jungle';
SELECT * FROM habitat ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM habitat WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';

SELECT animal.name, observation.observation_date, observation.observation_time FROM animal JOIN observation ON animal.id = observation.animal_id WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY observation_date ASC;

SELECT tourist.name, tourist.age, tourist.gender, habitat.name AS habitat_name FROM tourist JOIN visit ON tourist.id = visit.tourist_id JOIN habitat ON visit.habitat_id = habitat.id WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_visits, habitat.name AS habitat_name FROM visit JOIN habitat ON visit.habitat_id = habitat.id GROUP BY habitat.name HAVING total_visits > 5 ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
